en.title: 🇬🇧 About Us
en.description:
MapMark is an interactive web platform for travelers that connects people from all around the globe. We create a space where everyone can discover new places, share personal experiences, and help others plan their journeys.

🌍 Our Mission
To make traveling more accessible and inspire people to explore the world together.

✨ What We Offer:

An interactive world map with unique locations

Authentic reviews and photos from travelers

A rating system to choose the best spots

A community to connect with like-minded explorers

Multilingual support for easy use anywhere

🔐 We care about security, ensuring that your data is always protected.

MapMark is more than just a map – it's a living community of people who love to travel and discover the world.

cookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy
cookiePolicy.subtitle: Learn how MapMark uses cookies to enhance your experience

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.description: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit our website. They help us provide you with a better experience by remembering your preferences and improving our services.

howWeUseCookies.title: How We Use Cookies
howWeUseCookies.description: We use different types of cookies to enhance your experience on MapMark:

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly and cannot be disabled.

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.description: These cookies enhance your experience by remembering your choices and preferences.

examples.mapSettings: Map view preferences and zoom levels

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors use our website so we can improve it.

examples.usage: Website usage statistics and popular features
examples.performance: Page load times and performance metrics

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.description: We may use third-party services that set their own cookies:

maps.title: Map Services (Leaflet/OpenStreetMap)
maps.description: Used to display interactive maps and location data

analytics.title: Analytics Services
analytics.description: Help us understand user behavior and improve our services

manageCookies.title: Managing Your Cookies
manageCookies.description: You can control and manage cookies in several ways:

browsers.chrome: Settings > Privacy and security > Cookies and other site data
browsers.firefox: Settings > Privacy & Security > Cookies and Site Data
browsers.edge: Settings > Cookies and site permissions > Cookies and site data

consent.title: Cookie Consent
consent.description: By using MapMark, you consent to our use of cookies as described in this policy. We may ask for your explicit consent for certain types of cookies.
consent.withdrawal: You can withdraw your consent at any time by adjusting your browser settings or contacting us directly.

changes.description: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date. We encourage you to review this policy periodically.

helpCenter.title: Help Center
helpCenter.subtitle: Everything you need to know about using MapMark

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.description: MapMark is designed to help you discover and share amazing places around the world. Here's how to get started:

explore.title: Explore the Map
explore.description: Use the interactive world map to browse locations. Zoom in and out, drag to move around, and discover places that interest you.

click.title: Click on Locations
click.description: Click on any location marker to see details, existing reviews, and ratings from other travelers.

review.title: Share Your Experience
review.description: Add your own reviews and ratings to help other travelers discover great places and avoid disappointing ones.

map.title: Interactive World Map
map.description: Explore locations worldwide with our easy-to-use interactive map interface.

reviews.title: Real User Reviews
reviews.description: Read authentic reviews and ratings from travelers who have actually visited these places.

filters.title: Smart Filters
filters.description: Filter locations by country, category, or use the quick filter to find exactly what you're looking for.

languages.title: Multiple Languages
languages.description: Access MapMark in 12 different languages to make your experience more comfortable.

steps.find: Find the location you want to review on the map
steps.click: Click on the location marker to open the details popup
steps.write: Click 'Add Review' and write your honest experience
steps.rate: Give a star rating from 1 to 5 stars
steps.publish: Click 'Publish Review' to share with the community

navigation.title: Map Navigation
navigation.zoom: Use mouse wheel or +/- buttons to zoom in and out
navigation.drag: Click and drag to move around the map
navigation.search: Use the search bar to find specific locations
navigation.filters: Apply filters to show only certain types of places

account.question: Do I need an account to use MapMark?
account.answer: You can browse locations and read reviews without an account. However, to add your own reviews and save favorite places, you'll need to create a free account.

reviews.question: How do I write a good review?
reviews.answer: Be honest and specific about your experience. Include details about what made the place special, accessibility, best times to visit, and any tips for future visitors.

languages.question: Can I change the language?
languages.answer: Yes! MapMark supports 12 languages. You can change the language using the language selector in the header.

mobile.question: Does MapMark work on mobile devices?
mobile.answer: Absolutely! MapMark is fully responsive and works great on smartphones and tablets. You can access all features on any device.
